Lightroom workflow /!/ Just got the X-T3 and trying to figure everything out. I have so far been using Lightroom before the Fuji.

Immediately I have seen one issue. When I import the RAF file in to Lightroom , my simulation goes away as Lightroom applies the adobe default profile. I found out that I can switch the profile manually to select a fuji simulation, however I have no way of knowing what the originally applied simulation was in the camera.

Right now I am shooting RAW+JPEG just so I have the original image as well. Is there a way to get Lightroom to apply the right profile as I import the raw file?

Also in general what is a good workflow with Lightroom . I have been reading posts about needing the Iridient transformer? Is that really necessary? I tried playing around with Capture One for 5 minutes, maybe that wasn't enough time but it looked way too different and I don't think I want to transfer my entire catalog of images over.  Is it really that much better?

What are some Lightroom best practices you guys have come up with?

Thanks!
